testimonialsList.searchPlaceholder:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for the search input field
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Testimonials list (search bar)
**When Users See This**: When the search input is empty
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Search by student name or testimonial"
testimonialsList.noTestimonialsTitle:
**Functional Purpose**: Title indicating that there are no testimonials
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Testimonials list (empty state)
**When Users See This**: When no testimonials match the current filters or if no testimonials have been left yet
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You currently have no testimonials"
testimonialsList.noTestimonialsDescripti:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text about when testimonials are left
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Testimonials list (empty state)
**When Users See This**: When no testimonials match the current filters or if no testimonials have been left yet
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Testimonials are left by students on ending successful mentoring discussions."
